vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
προσμένω,
Doric dialect ποτι- [Refs 2nd c.BC+]:— bide, wait, χρόνον πολλόν [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἡσυχάζων π. [Refs]; π. χρόνον ὀλίγον ἔστ᾽ ἂν.., π. ἕως.., [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 with dative, remain attached to, cleave to, πάθεα π. τοκεῦσιν [NT+4th c.BC+]; π. ταῖς δεήσεσιν continue in.. , [NT+2nd c.AD+]
__II transitive, wait for, await, with accusative, [Refs 6th c.BC+]; face in battle, stand one's ground against, δορίκτυπον ἀλαλάν [Refs 5th c.BC+]: with accusative et infinitive future, Ὀρέστην τῶνδε προσμένουσ᾽ ἀεὶ παυστῆρ᾽ ἐφήξειν [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to be with, continue in, remain, stay
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to be with, continue in, remain, stay
to continue, remain, stay in a place, 1Tim. 1:3; to remain or continue with any one, Mt. 15:32; Mk. 8:2; Acts 18:18; to adhere to, Acts 11:23; metaphorically to remain constant in, persevere in, Acts 13:43; 1Tim. 5:5*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: permanecer o quedarse con ; mantenerse fiel a, continuar en
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 繼續持守 (關係或事物)
2) 留得再長一點 (徒 18:18; 提前 1:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 继续持守 (关系或事物)
2) 留得再长一点 (徒 18:18; 提前 1:3)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ở lại; nán ở lại. πρός (G4314) + μένω (G3306)
